snippet: The military had planned to hand over control of the prison on Saturday, but remarks President Hamid Karzai made about releases may have caused a reversal.
lead_paragraph: The military had planned to hand over control of the prison on Saturday, but remarks President Hamid Karzai made about releases may have caused a reversal.

headline.seo: U.S. Cancels Transfer of Bagram Prison to Afghans
headline.main: U.S. Cancels Transfer of Bagram Prison to Afghans
headline.print_headline: U.S. Cancels Transfer of Bagram Prison to Afghans
